DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine effect non-needle electro-acupuncture mild moderate anxiety . The hypothesis style treatment reduce state anxiety trait anxiety measure Spielberger STAI test .
DOC.brief_title: A Pilot Investigational Study : Treatment Anxiety With Non-Needle Electro-Acupuncture
DOC.detailed_description: Persistent unrelenting stress define anxiety . Anxiety disorder among common mental disorder society . The NIH estimate nearly 200 million Americans suffer anxiety . Anxiety disorder associate low quality life , functional impairment disability , also associate co-morbid physical illness . Acupuncture , one form complementary alternative medicine , use treat anxiety . Non-needle acupuncture one safest method , none rare side effect . This method study China ( Han 1986 ) America ( Ulett 1998 ) Pre-intervention testing , three treatment within one week , follow post intervention testing .
DOC.criteria: Normally healthy person mild moderate anxiety Severe anxiety , depression , pregnancy , previous experience HANS nonneedle electroacupuncture treatment
